attributes.title: Cause a death
attributes.review: Let’s start of with the fact that It made my phone glitch really bad, it took forever to download and it made my WiFi awful and usually I have amazing WiFi... this app also cause the death of one of my family members... it started flashing without stopping and caused him to seize up and die!! this app is awful and has caused so much sadness and grief in our family!! Do not get it!!!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I got this app to learn more ways that I could support the best president this country has ever seen, but I was very disappointed with this app. To preface, there’s nothing wrong with my phone or my WiFi, yet the app took forever to download and anytime I tried to start the app, it would just force close or stay on the loading screen without ever actually opening.

attributes.title: killed my turtle
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app, i wanted to see what it was all about. little did i know that my pet turtle, titan, was going to die exactly 6 minutes later. he choked on a cheeto that he randomly found on the ground, this is disturbing because i don't have any cheetos in my house at the moment. the only partially reasonable conclusion i can come to is that somehow this app MURDERED my baby titan. fly high my beautiful angel💙

attributes.title: My phone melted
attributes.review: Minutes after downloading this app my phone started vibrating and would not stop. Then the screen turned orange and it stared just randomly falling a sleep. After many attempts to get my phone to wake up, it finally booted back up to a bright orange screen and then started smoking. Before I could turn it off it just caught fire and started melting right on my table.

attributes.title: Most disgusting app ever 🤬
attributes.review: I hope no one votes for him I came on the app to see reasons why I should and they said because he’s good he talked about a race war Who talks about starting a race war that’s just pitiful and he said just because of the color on my skin that I shouldn’t with me on the app and I should be in somebody’s house cleaning up worst person ever to live on this earth he’s a horrible person don’t vote for him

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: Not get this app it will leave your phone and tablet in a really really bad condition I will give you glitches in viruses my tablet has never been the same with this app because my glitches and I would rather watch cats on an hour loop falling off of the counters and doing dumb stuff so please do not get this app for your safety is bad for you and it will give you a glitches goodbye

attributes.title: He literally an orange who gave my cat a seizure
attributes.review: I came here To support my favorite orange juice company but it gave my phone a huge glitch and it looks like my cat had a seizureBut he did in real life so we had to take me to the vet this is your fault I am soaked my phone from seeing that that orange man do not download app this app but if you wanna come in your eyes and bleach in through your phone then go go ahead and download it 👁👅👁👁👄👁👁👁

attributes.title: Probably Chinese Scammers
attributes.review: I looked up this app to support my newfound love for Trump and his work for our great nation, but I slowly started to realize that this might be one of those Chinese app scammers, like that popular teen app Tik Tik. Asked for way too much info, and all for nothing, completely useless. I can’t even share posts about Trump to my fellow republicans. Needs a whole new update, otherwise just get rid of it.

attributes.title: Reasons
attributes.review: I just downloaded the app to rate it one star because trump is trying to ban my only social modes called tiktok and I don’t think it’s fair because those are people’s only social media’s too also I think the only reason he wants to ban it is because us gen z’s want to free his son and wife and he is saying it’s to keep y’all safe make sure you take care of your country not a app also MEXICAN LIVES MATTER

attributes.title: Trying to find reasons to vote for POTUS
attributes.review:
From everything going on in the world...the way COVID-19 was handled, him supporting the confederate flag. Trump removed trans people from the military and tried to make it so LGBT+ can’t adopt from Christian adoption agencies. His lack of support for BLM. Trump’s tweets about the Central Park 5. Mike Pence. Friendship with Epstein. These are just a few reasons off the top of my head. 

Also this app was horrible, not user friendly and I don’t like the logo.
